tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to open redirect due to insufficient validation of the `next` URL parameter. Improper handling of backslashes, multiple leading slashes, and crafted netloc values allows attackers to bypass the validation logic and redirect users to external, attacker-controlled domains.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `Flask-Multipass` library to the patch version.
